chart_description: The HTTP Requests Duration chart shows the distribution of duration for HTTP requests in microseconds, handled by the Kubernetes kube-proxy component. It helps identify if there are any slow or failing requests, which can impact the overall performance of the system.

dimension_descriptions.0.5: The time it took for 50% of requests to complete.
dimension_descriptions.0.9: The time it took for 90% of requests to complete.
dimension_descriptions.0.99: The time it took for 99% of requests to complete.
